TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/LinkCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type LinkLabel.LinkCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的链接集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of links within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储 控件中显示的链接。The class stores the link displayed in the control. 集合中的每一项都是 类的实例，该类定义链接的信息。Each item in the collection is an instance of the class, which defines the information of the link. 方法提供将单个 添加到集合的功能。The method provides the ability to add a single to the collection. 若要删除链接，你可以使用 方法或 方法（如果你知道链接在集合中的位置）。To remove links, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the link is located within the collection. 利用 方法，您可以从集合中删除所有链接，而不必使用 方法一次删除单个链接。The method enables you to remove all links from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single link at a time. 除了用于添加和删除项的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找链接的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find links within the collection. 使用 方法可以确定 是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 知道链接位于集合内后，可以使用 方法来确定链接在集合中的位置。Once you know that the link is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the link is located within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不将此类的实例与 控件关联，则无法创建此类的实例。An instance of this class cannot be created without associating it with a control.

param.name: start
param.span: 标签文本中所创建的链接的起始字符。

span.span: The starting character within the text of the label where the link is created.

param.name: length
param.span: 链接文本中将包括的起始字符之后的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters after the starting character to include in the link text.

summary.span: 向集合添加链接。

span.span: Adds a link to the collection.

returns.span: 表示已创建并添加到集合中的链接的 。

span.span: A representing the link that was created and added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以在控件的文本中显示多个链接。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 利用 方法，您可以将 控件中的文本转换为可由用户单击以执行类似于 控件的任务的链接。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法将创建的链接添加到 的 。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 例如，如果您想要在标签文本中设置 "quick" 一词，即 "快速棕色 fox"，则调用此方法时，将 `start` 参数设置为四（4）的值，将 `length` 参数设置为五（5）。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). 然后，将更改为 "快速"，并将链接添加到集合中。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 如果要将信息与链接相关联，例如要显示的 URL 或用户单击链接时要打开的文件，请使用 方法的其他版本。If you want to associate information with the link, such as the URL to display or a file to open when the user clicks on the link, use the other version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 两个链接不能共享相同的文本。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果创建使用其他链接已使用的文本的链接，则会引发异常。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 枚举设置 属性。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置 、、 和 属性以及如何向 添加项。It also demonstrates setting the , , and properties and adding items to a . 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到空白窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeLinkLabel`。To run this example, paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

returns.span: 表示已创建并添加到集合中的链接的 。

span.span: A representing the link that was created and added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以在控件的文本中显示多个链接。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 利用 方法，您可以将 控件中的文本转换为可由用户单击以执行类似于 控件的任务的链接。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法将创建的链接添加到 的 。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 例如，如果您想要在标签文本中设置 "quick" 一词，即 "快速棕色 fox"，则调用此方法时，将 `start` 参数设置为四（4）的值，将 `length` 参数设置为五（5）。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). 然后，将更改为 "快速"，并将链接添加到集合中。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 此版本的 Add 方法使你能够提供可通过 `linkData` 参数与链接关联的其他信息。This version of the Add method enables you to provide additional information that can be associated with the link through the `linkData` parameter. 例如，可以将 传递给 `linkData` 参数，该参数包含在单击链接时要显示的 URL。For example, you can pass a to the `linkData` parameter that contains a URL to display when the link is clicked. 然后，你可以在处理程序中将此信息用于 控件的 事件，以在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中显示该 URL。You can then use this information in your handler for the event of the control to display the URL in Microsoft Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 两个链接不能共享相同的文本。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果创建使用其他链接已使用的文本的链接，则会引发异常。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，该控件显示一个链接，并在单击在控件的文本中定义的链接时在默认浏览器中显示 Microsoft 网站。The following code example creates a control that displays a link, and displays the Microsoft Web site in the default browser when the link defined in the control's text is clicked. 该示例定义了一个方法，该方法初始化 控件以及将处理控件的 事件的方法。The example defines a method that initializes the control as well as a method that will handle the event of the control. 事件的事件处理程序使用 类的 属性来确定要在默认浏览器中显示的 URL。The event handler of the event uses the property of the class to determine the URL to display in the default browser. 此示例要求它位于 类中。This example requires that it is located within a class. [!code-cpp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CPP/linklabelex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CS/linklabelex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/VB/linklabelex.vb#1)]

summary.span: 移除集合内指定位置处的链接。

span.span: Removes a link at a specified location within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合中删除链接时，集合中的后续项的索引将更改。When you remove a link from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection. 有关删除的链接的所有信息都将丢失。All information about the deleted link is lost. 通过指定要从集合中移除的链接的索引，可以使用此方法从集合中移除特定链接。You can use this method to remove a specific link from the collection by specifying the index of the link to remove from the collection. 若要指定要删除的链接而不是链接的索引，请使用 方法。To specify the link to remove instead of the index to the link, use the method. 若要从集合中删除所有链接，请使用 方法。To remove all links from the collection, use the method.

exception.span: 的值或者是负值，或者大于集合中的项数。

span.span: The value of is a negative value or greater than the number of items in the collection.

span.span: Removes the link with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 中 的键。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
